flavor: Whatever Thor can do, Hercules can accomplish more mightily!
name: Hercules
text: Reduce the cost to play Hercules by 1 for each minion engaged with you.

flavor: I am Valkyrie, shieldmaiden of Asgard.
name: Valkyrie
text: Response: After Valkyrie enters play, deal 2 damage to a minion (3 damage instead if you paid for this card using a [energy] resource).

name: Jarnbjorn
text: Restricted. Response: After your hero attacks an enemy, spend a [physical] resource → deal 2 damage to an enemy.

name: Teamwork
text: Hero Interrupt When you use your basic thwart power (THW) or basic attack power (ATK), exhaust an ally you control → add that ally's matching power to your hero's power for this use.
